servinfo.title: No cool air comes out (A/C system does not operate)

condition.ptxt: No cool air comes out (A/C system does not operate)

action.ptxt: Perform recovery, evacuation and charge referring to Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant .
Check related fuses, and then check for short circuit to ground.
Check evaporator temperature sensor referring to A/C Evaporator Temperature Sensor Inspection .
Check A/C refrigerant pressure sensor referring to A/C Refrigerant Pressure Sensor and Its Circuit Inspection .
Check ECT sensor referring to Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection .
Check ECM referring to A/C System Inspection at ECM .
Check HVAC control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .
Check magnet clutch referring to Magnet Clutch Operating Check or Magnet Clutch Operating Check .

ps.ptxt: Compressor drive belt loosened or broken

action.ptxt: Check compressor relay referring to A/C Compressor Relay Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Temperature selector, blower speed selector, and/or air flow selector faulty

action.ptxt: Check HVAC control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .
Check BCM referring to Inspection of BCM and Its Circuits .
